argument.name: Question_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of security questions defined for the published project.

argument.name: LocalRequest
argument.description: The Request variable. This system variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function.

page.description: Get Web Security Questions in CR-LF list. Use in Web Dialog component.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_Security_Ques() function retrieves a list of security questions for use in a drop down list control in a dialog component. Typically used in the Server Activate event of a dialog component.

item.name: Display the Form > Properties menu page of the Dialog Builder.
Click in the Server Events > Activate property.

section.description: Limitations: May only be used in a web component.

section.title: Example
section.description: Note that Request is the name of a variable created by the Application Server.
